name: @~lisfan/vue-logger
description: vue日志打印插件：输出内容的同时，输出调用打印方法所在的组件名称(具体到子组件)和路由名称

scripts.pub-n: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag nightly && npm run pub-post
scripts.pub-a: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag alpha && npm run pub-post
scripts.pub-b: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag beta && npm run pub-post
scripts.pub-rc: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag rc && npm run pub-post
scripts.pub-l: npm run pub-pre && npm publish && npm run pub-post
scripts.pub: git pull && npm publish && npm run pub-post

author: lisfan <goolisfan@gmail.com> (https://www.npmjs.com/~lisfan)
